plot: Two friends - Benik and Hayk - choose different routes after they finish school. Hayk enters the institute, while Benik tries to make money and bearly avoids being enlisted in a crime.
title: Tchanaparh
plot_es: Two friends - Benik and Hayk - choose different routes after they finish school. Hayk enters the institute, while Benik tries to make money and bearly avoids being enlisted in a crime.
plot_en: Two friends - Benik and Hayk - choose different routes after they finish school. Hayk enters the institute, while Benik tries to make money and bearly avoids being enlisted in a crime.
